Articles.Content:
I was able to do a single launch and only one refueling in Duna Orbit to accomplish this mission consisting of a Small Base Module, two Rovers, two of what I call a Rover Dozer and two Fuel Transport Rovers. In the future I will take a group photo.

http://i.imgur.com/GF72z47.png' alt='GF72z47.png'>

More pics here

http://imgur.com/a/yhc2A#0
Very...realistic. Now install FAR and launch that rocket. You will be punished severely...
